question:
If \(a \sharp b = \frac{1}{2a-3b}\) and \(a@b = 3a – 2b\), what is the value of \(1@2 - 3 \sharp 4\)?
(A) \(\frac{-7}{6}\)
(B) –1
(C) \(\frac{-5}{6}\)
(D) \(\frac{2}{3}\)
(E) \(\frac{7}{6}\)
